init.title: Recipe Extractor Options
init.description: Configure default settings for the Recipe Extractor integration.

data_description.api_key: Your Google Gemini API key. Get one at https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey. This will override the API key from configuration.yaml if provided.
data_description.default_todo_entity: Select the todo list entity to use by default for the extract_to_list service. You can still override this when calling the service.
data_description.default_model: Select the AI model to use for recipe extraction. gemini-2.5-flash (default) offers balanced speed and accuracy, gemini-2.5-pro is more accurate, gemini-2.5-flash-lite is fastest and cheapest but seems to struggle sometimes with output formatting.
data_description.convert_to_metric: Automatically convert imperial units (cups, oz, lb, °F) to metric (ml, g, kg, °C) when adding ingredients to lists.
